structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Compensation of board members -- Time and place of board meetings.

text.section: The board may fix the respective salaries of its members on a per meeting basis not to exceed twenty-five dollars ($25) per meeting and not to exceed one (1) meeting per month.
The board shall meet at least once a month at a time and place designated by the board and all meetings, except executive meetings, shall be open to the public.

law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 261, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 17, effective February 28, 1956.
